title: Civil Engineering All-In-One PE Exam Guide: Breadth and Depth
features: Ace the civil engineering PE exam on the first try!
Civil Engineering PE All-in-One Exam Guide

covers all the material included on the Principles and Practice of Civil Engineering (PE-CIVIL) exam, given by the National Council of Examiners for Engineering and Surveying (NCEES). Presented in the Breadth and Depth format of the actual exam, this authoritative volume features equations, diagrams, exam preparation strategies, and practice questions with solutions. Detailed and comprehensive, this book serves as both a complete certification exam guide and an essential on-the-job reference.

covers all the material included on the Principles and Practice of Civil Engineering (PE-CIVIL) exam, given by the National Council of Examiners in Engineering and Surveying (NCEES). has developed and taught review courses for Civil Engineering Principles & Practice (P.E.) and Fundamentals of Engineering (F.E.) exams since 2001. These courses are delivered in class and online environments. He has received teaching awards from the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers and Maryland Society of Professional Engineers. He currently teaches in the department of civil engineering at Morgan State University, Baltimore, Maryland.

author: {'avatar': 'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/01Kv-W2ysOL._SY600_.png', 'name': 'Indranil Goswami', 'about': ['Indranil Goswami has a Ph.D. in Civil Engineering from Johns Hopkins University. He has taught and conducted research at Morgan State University in Baltimore since 1992. He is a registered Professional Engineer in the State of Maryland and is a past president of the Baltimore Chapter of the Maryland Society of Professional Engineers. Indranil has taught PE (CIVIL) Review and FE (CIVIL) Review courses since 2001. Since 2010, all his review course are delivered via online webinars.', 'In 1998, he was nominated for the Bliss Medal for Academic Excellence by the Society of American Military Engineers and in 2003, received the Educator of the Year Award from the Maryland Society of Professional Engineers. In 2014 and 2015, he received the Best Faculty award from the student members of the Civil Engineering Honor Society at Morgan State University. He is the recipient of the Excellence in Engineering Education Award from the National Society of Professional Engineers in 2016.', 'He currently teaches both his PE Civil Review Course and the FE Review Course via live, online webinars. The PE Civil classes typically start in February and August each year. He can be reached at civilpereview@gmail.com']}
